title: If the Integrated Township area is more than 200 ha
clause_text: If the Integrated Township area is more than 200 ha., it can be segregated as long as each parcel is more than 40 ha. and is located within a radius of 5 kms. Provided that the land use mix is maintained in each parcel.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
